          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'Escola a casa. Ara sortim! / Obtenció de l'oli (La Pobla de Cérvoles)</string>
            <string language="en">"School at home". "An outing!" Oil production (in La Pobla de Cervoles)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"Schule zu Hause". "ein Outing!" 
Erdölgewinnung (in La Pobla de Cervoles)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"école à la maison". "une promenade!" 
Production de pétrole (en La Pobla de Cervoles)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"escola na HOME". "um outing!" 
Produção de óleo (em La Pobla de Cervoles)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"scuola nel paese". "un outing!" 
Produzione di petrolio (in La Pobla de Cervoles)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Σχολείο στο σπίτι". "Μια έξοδος!" 
Παραγωγή πετρελαίου (σε Λα Pobla de Cervoles)</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">El documental ens mostra el sistema tradicional d'obtenció de l'oli i el procés que el porta de l'arbre a la cuina.</string>
            <string language="en">The documentary shows the traditional method of producing oil and the whole process from the tree to the kitchen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">explotació agrària</string>
            <string language="en">farming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tractament dels aliments</string>
            <string language="en">food processing</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">Cross-curricular/extra-curricular activities</string>
            <string language="es">Activitates fuera de programa y transversales</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Dokumentarfilm zeigt die traditionelle 
Methode des Produzierens des Öls und des vollständigen Prozesses aus
dem Baum zur Küche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le documentaire montre la méthode traditionnelle 
de produire l'huile et le processus entier à partir de l'arbre à la 
cuisine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O documentary mostra o método tradicional de 
produzir o óleo e o processo inteiro da árvore à cozinha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il documentary mostra il metodo tradizionale di 
produrre l'olio ed il processo intero dall'albero alla cucina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ντοκιμαντέρ εμφανίζει παραδοσιακή μέθοδο το 
πετρέλαιο και ολόκληρη τη διαδικασία από το δέντρο στην κουζίνα.</string>
          </description>
